Name: Landmarks, Constellation CB17, Brooklyn (C 250315 HAK).
Title: Application number C 250315 HAK (Constellation CB17) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 395-397 East 94th Street (Block 4669, Lots 22 and 23), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 17, Council District 41.
